about_the_game:
Welcome to Panic Delivery!

Are you ready to step into the shoes of an underpaid human delivery driver working for a monstrous corporation? In Panic Delivery, a 4-player online cooperative horror/comedy game, you’ll take on the role of a brave (or foolish) delivery agent tasked with bringing packages to the eerie and dangerous inhabitants of a monster-filled world.

Key Features

Deliver Packages in Chaotic Situations

Your job is simple: deliver packages. The execution? Not so much. Navigate through perilous environments filled with lurking dangers, all while ensuring that your cargo remains intact and your limbs uneaten. Monsters can be… difficult clients, and some of them may prefer you as a snack rather than appreciate your timely service.

Teamwork Makes the Dream Work

Work together with up to three friends to ensure your deliveries make it to their destinations. Proximity chat keeps you connected but also adds a layer of tension—stick together to survive, or risk facing the consequences of splitting up.

Defend Yourself

The monsters won’t always play nice. Equip yourself with a variety of tools and weapons to fend off aggressive clients. From special energy guns to trusty melee weapons, you’ll have what you need to fight back—if you’re brave enough.

Innovative Exploration Gear

Sometimes running is your best option. Utilize exploration and traversal tools such as guns that alter surfaces or distraction devices, and even monster repellents to outwit the dangers you face. Specialized backpacks and other equipment can help you carry more packages safely or complete your routes more efficiently.

Horror and Comedy Collide

Laugh in the face of danger! Panic Delivery blends creepy atmospheres and pulse-pounding moments with hilarious situations and quirky monster characters. The combination of spooky tension and absurd humor makes every session memorable.

Diverse Locations

Travel through a variety of unique and treacherous areas, including abandoned cities, dark forests, creepy carnivals, and the infamous Mall of Doom. Each location brings its own challenges and monstrous residents to contend with.

Swift and Precise

Speed and care are key. Deliver packages quickly and without damage to earn bonuses and keep the clients—and your monstrous bosses—happy. Sloppy deliveries may cost you your reputation… or your life.

Will you deliver with courage, or will you panic and run?

Grab your uniform, gather your team, and get ready for the most chaotic delivery job of your life in Panic Delivery!

name: Panic Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A horror/comedy co-op game for 4 players: deliver packages in a dystopian world ruled by a ruthless and grotesque society of monsters!
